ACE_2: ACE2 ocean depth and land elevation
AODAC: SYNERGY L2 NTC Aerosol Climatology Data File
AODLR: SYNERGY L2 NTC Land Spectral Reflectance LUT Data File
AODOR: SYNERGY L2 NTC Ocean Surface Reflectance LUT Data File
AODPP: SY2 Global Aerosol Processing Control Parameter File
AODRT: SYNERGY L2 NTC Atmospheric Radiative Transfer LUT Data File
ATMIMA: AnaTm image parameters file (long name: GS2_ANA_TM_IMAGE_PARAMETERS)
ATMSAD: AnaTm HK parameters file (long name: GS2_ANA_TM_SAD_PARAMETERS)
BB2AX: IERS Bulletin B 2000 format used for the13initialization of time
BLINDP: List of blind pixels (long name: GS2_BLIND_PIXELS)
CDIST: global map of distance to the nearest coast line
CONVER: Mapping parameters from 16 to 18 bits (long name: GS2_MAPPING_PARAMETERS_16_TO_8_BITS)
DECOMP: On board decompression parameters file (long name: GS2_DECOMP_PARAMETERS)
DORDOP: DORIS Measurements packets including doppler, datation, test packets and reports
DORNAV: Navigation packets including ITRF, geodetic and J2000
ECMWA: ECMWF files covering the processing time span (Analysis)
FRPCM: FRP Classification Fire Mask Data File
FRPLC: FRP GLC2000 Global Mask Data File
FRPPP: SL2 FRP Processing Control Parameter File
G2PARE: Geometric parameter to refine (long name: GS2_PARAMETERS_TO_BE_REFINED)
GETAS: Global Earth Topography And Sea Surface Elevation version 3
GIP_INTDET: Description of the inter detectors overlapping area
GIP_L2ACAC: Calibration parameters for the atmosphericcorrection algorithm
GIP_L2ACSC: Calibration parameters for the scene classificationalgorithm
GIP_R2BINN: Binning for 60m bands parameters (filters and undersampling)
GIP_R2DECT: Threshold file for deconvolution through wavelet packets
GIP_R2DEFI: Deconvolution filter for each deconvoluted band
GIP_R2EOB2: Radiometric equalization parameters on board (darkcurrent, on-board inter pixel calibration)
GIP_R2EQOG: Radiometric equalization parameters on ground (on-ground correction)
GIP_VIEDIR: Pixel line of sight for each bands in the focal planereference frame
HKML0_: Payload and Platform House Keeping telemetry packets
INTDE: Description of the inter detectors overlapping area
INTDET: Description of the inter detectors overlapping area (long name: GS2_INTER_DETECTOR_PARAMETERS)
INVLOC: InitLoc Inv parameters file (long name: GS2_INTER_DETECTOR_PARAMETERS)
JP2KPA: Compression JP2K parameters file (long name: GS2_JP2K_PARAMETERS)
L2AAC: Calibration parameters for the atmospheric correction algorithm
L2ACAC: Calibration parameters for the atmospheric correction algorithm (long name: Level-2A_CAL_AC_Ground_Image_Processing_Parameter)
L2ACSC: Calibration parameters for the scene classification algorithm (long name: Level-2A_CAL_SC_Ground_Image_Processing_Parameter)
L2ASC: Calibration parameters for the scene classification algorithm
LREXTR: LR Extraction parameters file (long name: GS2_LR_EXTRACTION_PARAMETERS)
MSICC: monthly climatology of sea ice concentration
NATL0_: Telemetry Source packets (navigation and attitude, i.e. state vectors and quaternions)
OLCCR0: OLCI calibration with no spectral relaxation
OLCEFR: Full Resolution top of atmosphere radiance
OLCERR: Reduced Resolution top of atmosphere radiance
OLCLFR: Full Resolution Land & Atmosphere geophysical products
OLCRAC: Dark offset and gain coefficients from radiometric calibration
OLEOP: Processing Control Parameter File for EO mode
OLLUT: Classification Thresholds LUTs Data File contains
OLQCPA: OLQC configuration parameters file (long name: N/A: Multiple files)
OLRAC: Processing Control Parameter File for RC (Radiometric Calibration) mode
OLSPC: Processing Control Parameter File for SC (Spectral Calibration) mode
PRDLOC: InitLoc production parameters file (long name: GS2_INIT_LOC_PROD_PARAMETERS)
R2BIN: Binning for 60m bands parameters (filters and undersampling)
R2BINN: Binning for 60m bands parameters (filters and undersampling) (long name: GS2_RADIOS2_BINNING)
R2DEC: Threshold file for deconvolution through wavelet packets
R2DECT: Threshold file for deconvolution through wavelet packets (long name: GS2_RADIOS2_DECONVOLUTION_THRESHOLD)
R2DEF: Deconvolution filter for each deconvoluted band
R2DEFI: Deconvolution filter for each deconvoluted band (long name: GS2_RADIOS2_DECONVOLUTION_FILTER)
R2DEPI: List of defective pixels (long name: GS2_RADIOS2_DEFECTIVE_PIXELS)
R2EB2: Radiometric equalization parameters on board (dark current, on-board inter pixel calibration
R2EOB2: Radiometric equalization parameters on board (dark current, on-board inter pixel calibration (long name: GS2_RADIOS2_EQUALIZATION_ONBOARD_2T)
R2EOG: Radiometric equalization parameters on ground (onground correction)
R2EQOG: Radiometric equalization parameters on ground (onground correction) (long name: GS2_RADIOS2_EQUALIZATION_ONGROUND)
R2SWIR: SWIR detectors arrangement parameters (long name: GS2_RADIOS2_SWIR_REARRANGEMENT)
S02MSIL2A: Atmospherically corrected Surface Reflectances in cartographic geometry
SDRRT: SYN L2 Radiative Transfer Simulation Data File
SLCDP: Probability look-up tables associated to cloudy conditions Data File
SLCLP: Probability look-up tables associated to clear conditions Data File
SLIRE: Input Land Surface IR Emissivity Data File
SLLCC: Input Land Cloud Coefficient Data File
SLSFRP: Fire Radiative Power and associated parameters
SLSL0_: SLSTR ISPs including all targets (EO, black body and VISCAL)
SLSRBT: SLSTR Level 1 Earth Observation product - Brightness temperatures and radiances
SY2PP: SY2 Processing Control Parameters Data File
SYCDI: Map File of the distance to the coast
SYMCH: Inter-channel Spatial Misregistration Characterization Data File
SYNAOD: Global Aerosol parameter over land and sea on super pixel resolution (4.5km x 4.5km)
SYNSDR: Surface Reflectance and Aerosol parameters over Land
SYNV10: 1km VEGETATION-Like product (~VGT-S10) 10 day synthesis surface reflectance and NDVI
SYNVG1: 1km VEGETATION-Like product (~VGT-S1) 1 day synthesis surface reflectance and NDVI
SYNVGK: Surface reflectance over Land - use as input for VG-S product
SYSRF: VGT-P Spectral Response Function Data File
VGSRT: VGT-S Radiative Transfer Simulation Data File
VGTRT: VGT-P Radiative Transfer Simulation Data File
VIEDI: Pixel line of sight for each bands in the focal plane reference frame
VIEDIR: Pixel line of sight for each bands in the focal plane reference frame (long name: GS2_VIEWING_DIRECTIONS)
VSWCD: Visible and Shortwave Infrared Characterisation Data File
